definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] (a type of zither)/musical instrument in general
variant of 琴[qin2], guqin or zither

sentences.english: After you have been playing for some time, you may wish to buy harmonicas in other keys as well.
sentences.chinese: 学习一段时间以后，你可以考虑高买其他调子的口琴。

sentences.english: The high notes are always harder to play, regardless of the brand of harmonica.
sentences.chinese: 无论是哪个品牌的口琴，高位孔都比较难吹好。

sentences.english: He then mastered the harmonica and the piano .
sentences.chinese: 接着，他又掌握了口琴和钢琴。

sentences.english: When he picked up a harmonica, he learned to play it in hours.
sentences.chinese: 当他获得一只支口琴，在几小时之内就可以学会演奏。

sentences.english: One cat plays the harmonica as the other cats ride on their sailboat.Another cat brought a net.
sentences.chinese: 在其他猫乘上帆船时，一只猫吹着口琴。

sentences.english: Since harmonicas are very small, they are the perfect instrument to travel with.
sentences.chinese: 由于口琴很小，他非常适合带着旅行的乐器。

sentences.english: What are the main characteristics of a diatonic harp, for example.
sentences.chinese: 比如，什么是布鲁斯口琴最重要的特征？

sentences.english: It is perhaps easier to play some notes on the Chromatic than it is on the 10 hole harmonica.
sentences.chinese: 也许在半音阶口琴上更容易去吹奏某些音符。

sentences.english: Yeah, you know, you get people on the harmonica playing blues.
sentences.chinese: 是的，你可以看到有人用口琴吹奏蓝调音乐。

sentences.english: However, it is not common to use two harmonicas.
sentences.chinese: 不过，同时使用两把口琴的情况是不常见的。

sentences.english: It felt forced to me, with her harmonica and all.
sentences.chinese: 感觉起来好像是针对我，她的口琴和所有。

sentences.english: Around this time I started playing the harmonica and guitar.
sentences.chinese: 在此期间，我开始演奏口琴和吉他。

sentences.english: How deep is it proper to contain the harmonica in mouth while playing?
sentences.chinese: 吹口琴时，口琴应当含多深阿？

sentences.english: How deep is it proper to contain the harmonica in mouth while playing?
sentences.chinese: 吹口琴时，口琴应当含多深阿？

sentences.english: Try learning some of the beginning tunes on the " Tunes " page.
sentences.chinese: 试着吹奏口琴曲谱页面上最开始的一些曲子。

sentences.english: So, you knowledge and experience form the tremolo can be applied to your new 10 hole harmonica.
sentences.chinese: 所以你在复音口琴上的经验可以应用到10孔口琴上。

definition: hulusi, aka cucurbit flute (a kind of free reed wind instrument)
